The Hot Five Angry Birds Introduction

Angry Birds is a video game by Rovio for the Apple iPhone, Apple iPad, Android Smartphone or other touch devices(Tablet PC). In a nutshell, the darned pigs stole the birds’ eggs, and the angry birds must take their revenge by flinging themselves (with your help) via slingshot at those darned pigs to knock down their houses and kill the pigs. To win full star and high score, now learn feature of each birds before you play the game.

http://www.vkamobi.com/angry-birds/5pcs-10cm-cute-angry-birds-plush-toy-set.html

Red Bird

The angry bird that starts it all is red bird. He is smallish, red, and oh so angry. What you see is what you get with red bird. No tapping the screen unless there’s a smudge. Red angry bird is good for running directly into pigs though or knocking down wooden parts of the pigs’ house.

Yellow Bird

This angry bird is triangle shaped and yellow. He sails through the air with the greatest of ease, that is, till you tap the screen which speeds him up considerably. This also gives this angry bird more power to knock down the pigs’ house.

Blue Bird

Blue bird, or should I say blue birds, are useful little critters in the Angry Birds game. The blue bird starts off as one tiny blue bird, but when you tap the screen, he separates into three birds that can do triple the damage. Triple the fun. Not to the pigs of course. Ha ha, pigs.

White Bird

White bird is one angry bird. He is fat and round and white. His best feature? With a tap of the screen, white bird drops an egg on pigs or on their house. Take that, pigs!

Black Bird

Black bird is a rotund fellow who is spitting mad. In fact, after you sling him at the sneaky pigs, he nestles among the pigs’ structure, turns red, then blows up. He’s that mad. And black bird does some serious damage.

http://www.vkamobi.com/angry-birds/5pcs-10cm-cute-angry-birds-plush-toy-set.html

Angry Birds has been praised for its successful combination of addictive gameplay, comical style, and low price. And the picture I show above are angry birds plush toy set, It is great for Angry Birds fans. It is a good decoration for homes and cars.
